name: Blade
detailed_location: On a roof northeast ofUlysses' Temple
description:
Blade is a 150 year-old Ghoul Male.

Blade is a unique and formidable marked man encountered at the Divide in 2281. As a scout residing near Ulysses' Temple, he demonstrates exceptional combat skills that surpass typical marked men and rival those of a companion. True to his name, he is a master swordsman wielding the Blade of the West, though he first engages targets from a distance with plasma grenades. Blade moves 15% faster than average NPCs and deals 25 additional points of melee damage per hit. His tactical prowess is enhanced by his use of a Stealth Boy, allowing him to approach undetected and evade V.A.T.S. targeting.

Blade's Personality: Disciplined and observant, Blade exhibits the patience and strategic thinking of a seasoned scout. Despite his former Legion allegiance, he now operates with a self-preservation mindset, showing no particular allegiance beyond his own survival. He is quiet and focused, preferring action to conversation.

Blade's Backstory: Once a frumentarius of Caesar's Legion, Blade was an elite scout and spy who operated in the Mojave Wasteland. His exact circumstances of transformation into a marked man remain unknown, but exposure to the Divide's unique radiation and environmental hazards likely caused his ghoulification. Unlike many Legion members, he abandoned his post and became a solitary figure near Ulysses' Temple. His past as a frumentarius honed his combat skills and scouting abilities, making him one of the most dangerous marked men in the Divide.
